Articles.Content:
Kerbal Space Program - Best Mun landing ever

This has to be the best landing ever. 8)
Hacked landing legs? They can\'t be that strong by default...

Jeb is missing out on this?!

Nice landing, fake or no fake.
what the heck are the landing struts made from kerbal?.

I like the way your rocket lands pointing down. I myself created a whole ship that flies the entire mission facing backwards, it makes navigating with the navball fun, I\'ll tell you that much. You basically have to reverse everything you\'ve learned.
If those legs weren\'t adjusted, you sir are a god!

I didn\'t hack anything, this just happened. ???

And for the landing legs pointing upward, it\'s because I was supposed to use them as 'claws' to get my lost command pod from the mun.

Thanks for the replies guys

Something like that happend to me too.

The poor Kerbal Chad flies around Kerbin in Space. 200 000 meters above.

And after a few Minutes I started a rocket. I saw a Kerbal next to the Pod. It was Chad. Strange?

How did he survived that fall?

Post something if that happed to you.

And on Mun happed the samething. My Lander just Exploded, because there were a part of my rocket.

I clicked EVA. And then, they were falling. They survived the Fall, again. Why? ???
Glitches and bugs, glitches and bugs everywhere. ;P
